description: This table contains modifiers associated with dental procedures.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_MODIFIER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the procedure modifiers for dental procedures. These modifiers may be used to provide details about dental procedures.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_MODIFIER_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
